mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, password, member_name, social_type, social_id, birthday, gender, email, image_url, region, job, test_status, active_status, refresh_token, withdraw_date, role, join_date) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{password}, #{memberName}, #{socialType}, #{socialId}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{imageUrl}, #{region}, #{job}, #{testStatus}, #{activeStatus}, #{refreshToken}, #{withdrawDate}, #{role}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET refresh_token = #{refreshToken} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE email = #{email}
